cluster_images.neural module

cluster_images.neural.create_neural_descriptors(dataset)[source]

Download a pre-trained MobileNetV2 and create neural descriptors of the input dataset.

Parameters

dataset (DatasetV2) – A TensorFlow BatchedDataset. Ensure that the input size is (batch_size, 96, 96, 3).

Return type

ndarray

Returns

A nx1024 NumPy array, where n is the number of dataset items.
